page.title: 08BALMORAL-KING'S HALL COMPLEX
page.content: The dominating feature of this area is the King's Hall which provides a wide variety of entertainment for the city and country. The area contains many low density dwellings but is gradually being integrated into middle to inner city developments with new housing schemes and a flyover on the main Lisburn Road. The age of the occupants of the houses is reflected in the closure of Malone Primary School which has now become a private primary school serving south Belfast. In spite of building development in the area there is still a large proportion of green areas including an 18 hole Golf Course. The Balmoral Complex is used for Agricultural Shows and Pop Concerts.
